verses.roman:
batriśa lakṣaṇa--mahāpuruṣa-bhūṣaṇa
ei śiśu aṅge dekhi se saba lakṣaṇa

synonyms: batriśa—thirty-two; lakṣaṇa—symptoms; mahā-puruṣa—great personality; bhūṣaṇa—ornament; ei śiśu—this child; aṅge—on the body; dekhi—I see; se—those; saba—all; lakṣaṇa—symptoms.
translation: "There are thirty-two bodily marks that symptomize a great personality, and I see all those marks on the body of this child.
